Class AbstractLoader<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.io.AbstractLoader<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputLoader<T>, ResourceLoader<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CrossRef, FASTALoader, FASTAParser, FASTQParser, GBIFTaxonomy, NasaExoplanets, NCBITaxonomy, OpenWeatherLoader, SimbadLoader, StarLoader, UniProtLoader, VirusLoader
public abstract class AbstractLoader<T> extends Object implements InputLoader<T>
Abstract base class for data loaders with built-in caching, fallback to embedded sample data (MiniCatalog), and logging.

Loading strategy:

  1. Check local cache
  2. Try to load from primary source (API/file)
  3. If unavailable, fallback to embedded MiniCatalog sample data
  4. Log warning when using fallback

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
